doc:
Liberace https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Liberace 0 Władziu Valentino Liberace (May 16, 1919 – February 4, 1987) was an American pianist, singer and actor. A child prodigy and the son of Polish and Italian immigrants, Liberace enjoyed a career spanning four decades of concerts, recordings, television, motion pictures, and endorsements. At the height of his fame, from the 1950s to the 1970s, Liberace was the highest-paid entertainer in the world, with established concert residencies in Las Vegas, and an international touring schedule. Liberace embraced a lifestyle of flamboyant excess both on and off stage, acquiring the nickname "Mr. Showmanship". Władziu_Valentino_Liberace ( May_16_,_1919 – February_4_,_1987 ) was an_American_pianist , singer_and_actor . A_child_prodigy and the_son of Polish_and_Italian_immigrants , Liberace enjoyed a_career spanning four_decades of concerts , recordings , television , motion_pictures , and endorsements . At the_height of his_fame , from the_1950s to the_1970s , Liberace was the_highest-paid_entertainer in the_world , with established_concert_residencies in Las_Vegas , and an_international_touring_schedule . Liberace embraced a_lifestyle of flamboyant_excess both on and off stage , acquiring the_nickname " Mr._Showmanship " .
